feed.title: Combined summary - good bitcoin summary paper in more detail than Satoshi paper (Re: Bitcoin Protocol Specification)

entry.title: Combined summary - good bitcoin summary paper in more detail than Satoshi paper (Re: Bitcoin Protocol Specification)
entry.summary: Krzysztof Okupski has shared a 29-page protocol specification document on the Bitcoin development mailing list for review and improvement. The document contains detailed information on formats, scripts, and examples that are difficult to put together without examining the source or asking experts at the algorithm/code level. In response to the document, Adam Back suggested summarizing its content in a paragraph so people can determine if they feel qualified and interested in reviewing it. Krzysztof provided a link to the PDF file and requested feedback from the audience on any errors or suggestions that could improve the document.
